page.title: 11HORTICULTURE - MENSTRIE
page.content: Glenochil Nursery is situated on the main road between Menstrie and Alva. It has 27 men working there. In the nursery there are many species of plants mostly annuals. The nursery is non-profit making, but once a year it holds an open day to sell off the surplus plants.To rear the young plants an electric blanket is embedded in the soil keeping the temperature roughly 160'F.Sprinklers water thrice daily.The machinery mainly consists of a compost maker, tractors and diesel powered lawn mowers. 15,000 annuals are planted each year, with around 800 trees planted. In the greenhouses the plants that have been mistreated by the public are kept, making it into a plant hospital.
